data.message: So FB have restricted my post and other activities on my other account because on of Donald Trump's supporters were calling black people racist names and I called him back a name and he reported my comment and you restricted my account, how fair is that? So FB is only protecting a certain type of people huh So now I am unable to do anything on my account except read post, because even though you claim to restrict me for 72 hours it has been 4 days now and nothing. Thank you for being 'fair'.
